Hi! Anyone know how to check current cash back status in Citibank app?
If one has enough assets to buy and hold and generate regular income  that could replace a full time job's income.YMMV

Purely illustrative example:If one has $10 million cash now  can buy 10 year Singapore Government Bonds at about 3% p.a. now.That would generate $300k Fixed Income per year or $25k per month.And I dare say this strategy is 100% make money at face value.(Lose to inflation or not I cannot comment  because my take is if you are not buying big value items  actually inflation even at 5% won't dent much of your monthly income).

To be very very clear  I am not suggesting anyone do this. I am just giving an example. Building a robust investment portfolio with a high certainty of return without much chances of losses is highly complicated and not something I think can be covered easily in a public forum.
